name: AVPlaybackCoordinatorPlaybackControlDelegate
desc: A protocol that defines the method to implement to respond to playback commands from the playback coordinator.

items.name: func playbackCoordinator(AVDelegatingPlaybackCoordinator, didIssue: AVDelegatingPlaybackCoordinatorPlayCommand, completionHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to match the playback rate to that of the group when the rate is nonzero.

items.name: func playbackCoordinator(AVDelegatingPlaybackCoordinator, didIssue: AVDelegatingPlaybackCoordinatorPauseCommand, completionHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to pause playback.

items.name: func playbackCoordinator(AVDelegatingPlaybackCoordinator, didIssue: AVDelegatingPlaybackCoordinatorSeekCommand, completionHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to seek to a new time.

items.name: func playbackCoordinator(AVDelegatingPlaybackCoordinator, didIssue: AVDelegatingPlaybackCoordinatorBufferingCommand, completionHandler: () -> Void)
items.desc: Tells the delegate to expect playback soon and to start buffering media data in preparation.
